reference: The Swedish data for production of individual foreign affiliates come from the Industriens Utredn-ingsinstitut (IUI) of Stockholm. The IUI has completed four surveys of Swedish multinationals foreign investment abroad covering 1965, 1970, 1974, and 1978. These surveys cover virtually all Swedish firms investing abroad and are in general comparable to the BEA surveys (see Swedenborg, 1979 and 1982). Exports by the U.S. and all market economies to different countries, by the industry classifications used in the U.S. direct investment survey, were taken from United Nations trade tapes and converted from the SITC to this industry classification. Swedish exports by industry are from Statistiska S Centralbyran (Utdrag ur Makrobasen). - 31 -
